nl.esciencecenter.neon.math

Class Color4

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.neon.math.Float4Vector
      • nl.esciencecenter.neon.math.Color4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FloatVector

    public class Color4
extends Float4Vector
    More specific implementation of a color Float4Vector.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Color4()
      Stand-in for a vector, in which the places represent R, G, B and A values.

      Stand-in for a vector, in which the places represent R, G, B and A values.
      Color4(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Stand-in for a vector, in which the places represent R, G, B and A values.
      Color4(String hex)
      Make a color using a HTML-style hex code with 6 or 8 places.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Color4

        public Color4()
        Stand-in for a vector, in which the places represent R, G, B and A values.

      • Color4

        public Color4(Float4Vector v)
        Stand-in for a vector, in which the places represent R, G, B and A values.
        Parameters:
        v - A vector to be cloned as a color value.

      • Color4

        public Color4(float r,
      float g,
      float b,
      float a)
        Stand-in for a vector, in which the places represent R, G, B and A values.
        Parameters:
        r - The Red component to this color.
        g - The Green component to this color.
        b - The Blue component to this color.
        a - The Alpha component to this color.

      • Color4

        public Color4(String hex)
       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Make a color using a HTML-style hex code with 6 or 8 places. Do not use a \# before the code.
        Parameters:
        hex - The Hex code to convert to a color, use 8 or 6 characters, depending on alpha yes/no.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the hex string has an incorrect length.
